column1: Image size (128, 256) with weighting in T1 of the MRI, showing the head of a woman of 66 years old of axial section. Slice n°53 is observed starting from the base of the skull. The image reveals the presence of the left cerebellar cortex of volume 56.2500 mm³, the brainstem of volume 73.7500 mm³, the right cerebellar cortex of volume 67.5000 mm³ and the  of volume 55.0000 mm³.
